bibl.title: Theodosius and his Byzantine Successors on the Participle: A Didactic Approach.
bibl.note: See. in part. pp. 406-409: The participle in the ancient Greek grammatical tradition [discusses some scholarly treatises transmitted on papyrus].

bibl.title: Ancient Scholarship and Grammar. Archetypes, Concepts and Contexts.

bibl.seg: Van Elst Valerie, Theodosius and his Byzantine Successors on the Participle: A Didactic Approach.

Stephanos Matthaios, Franco Montanari and Antonios Rengakos (Edd.), Ancient Scholarship and Grammar. Archetypes, Concepts and Contexts = Trends in Classics. Supplementary Volumes. 8 (Berlin - New York, 2011) pp. 405-428.
See. in part. pp. 406-409: The participle in the ancient Greek grammatical tradition [discusses some scholarly treatises transmitted on papyrus].
